song_lyrics: Dīn vachan mukhte nahi kaheve, raheve mān rahit... Kahat ṭek.
Kām krodh mad lobh īrṣhyā, kabahu dhare nahi chitta;
Brahma akhanḍ swarūp āpako, samajat triguṇātīt... Kahat 1
Prākṛut nām rūp sab mithyā, pinḍ-brahmānḍ sahit;
Māyā jīv īsh brahmahukī, jānat sabahī rīt... Kahat 2
Vimaḷ vivek ṭek ur antar, sab jagahu ke mīt;
Brahmānand kahat Hari so, priya jogī indriyajīt... Kahat 3
title: Kahat Hari ese janse prīt

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1274: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Sant Mahima Pad
